mil7.5.10:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘hatthissa panca angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani panca angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.5.10:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, hatthi nama caranto yeva pathavim daleti;
mil7.5.10:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena kayam sammasamaneneva sabbe kilesa daletabba.
mil7.5.10:1.4: Idam, maharaja, hatthissa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.5.10:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, hatthi sabbakayeneva apaloketi, ujukamyeva pekkhati, na disavidisa viloketi;
mil7.5.10:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sabbakayena apalokina bhavitabbam, na disavidisa viloketabba, na uddham ulloketabbam, na adho oloketabbam, yugamattapekkhina bhavitabbam.
mil7.5.10:2.3: Idam, maharaja, hatthissa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.5.10:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, hatthi anibaddhasayano gocarayamanugantva na tameva desam vasatthamupagacchati, na dhuvappatitthalayo;
mil7.5.10:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena anibaddhasayanena bhavitabbam, niralayena pindaya gantabbam, yadi passati vipassako manunnam patirupam ruciradese bhavam mandapam va rukkhamulam va guham va pabbharam va, tattheva vasamupagantabbam, dhuvappatitthalayo na katabbo.
mil7.5.10:3.3: Idam, maharaja, hatthissa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.5.10:4.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, hatthi udakam ogahitva sucivimalasitalasalilaparipunnam kumuduppalapadumapundarikasanchannam mahatimahantam padumasaram ogahitva kilati gajavarakilam;
mil7.5.10:4.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sucivimalavippasannamanaviladhammavaravaripunnam vimuttikusumasanchannam mahasatipatthanapokkharanim ogahitva nanena sankhara odhunitabba vidhunitabba, yogavacarakila kilitabba.
mil7.5.10:4.3: Idam, maharaja, hatthissa catuttham angam gahetabbam.
mil7.5.10:5.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, hatthi sato padam uddharati, sato padam nikkhipati;
mil7.5.10:5.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena satena sampajanena padam uddharitabbam, satena sampajanena padam nikkhipitabbam, abhikkamapatikkame saminjanapasarane sabbattha satena sampajanena bhavitabbam.
mil7.5.10:5.3: Idam, maharaja, hatthissa pancamam angam gahetabbam.
